basic.description:
{Basic First Aid}

Gives control of the first aid tent to the hero, healing up to 100 points of damage to the first unit of the selected stack and cast Stone Skin at beginning of battle for 10 rounds.

advanced.description:
{Advanced First Aid}

Gives control of the first aid tent to the hero, healing up to 225 points of damage to the first unit of the selected stack and cast Stone Skin at beginning of battle for 25 rounds.

expert.description:
{Expert First Aid}

Gives control of the first aid tent to the hero, healing up to 400 points of damage to the first unit of the selected stack and cast Stone Skin at beginning of battle for 50 rounds.
